## `SetPlotBackgroundImage`

Sets the graph background\index{Images!graph backgrounds} (plot area) image.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
SetPlotBackgroundImage(string imagePath)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
|`string` imagePath | The path to the image. |
